TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 为 、、、 和 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the , , , , and events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类，可以检查已由执行的数据操作的结果控件。The class enables you to examine the results of data operations that have been performed by a control. 一个对象传递给事件处理程序， ， ， ，并且事件的控件。A object is passed to event handlers for the , , , , and events of the control. 如果已成功完成数据操作，生成的数据对象存储在属性和属性是`null`。If the data operation completed successfully, the resulting data object is stored in the property and the property is `null`. 如果数据操作失败，数据操作期间发生的异常将存储在属性和属性是`null`。If the data operation failed, the exception that occurred during the data operation is stored in the property and the property is `null`. 如果处理所表示的异常属性，设置属性设置为`true`，以便不会引发异常。If you handled the exception represented by the property, set the property to `true` so that the exception will not be thrown. 检索从通过查询返回的数据记录总数属性。You retrieve the total number of data records returned from a query through the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的事件处理程序事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 事件处理程序中，如果属性是`null`，此对象中检索 ID 的产品属性。In the event handler, if the property is `null`, the product ID is retrieved from the object in the property. 产品 ID 是主键的表和数据库设置，因此，完成插入操作之前，不知道值。The product ID is a primary key for the table and is set by the database, therefore the value is not known until the insert operation has finished. 如果记录异常消息属性不等于`null`。The exception message is logged if the property is not equal to `null`. 属性设置为`true`。The property is then set to `true`. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在操作期间引发异常时，会使用此构造函数。This constructor is used when an exception is thrown during the data operation. 属性自动设置为`null`。The property is automatically set to `null`.

param.name: result
param.span: 包含数据操作结果数据的对象。

summary.span: 使用包含数据操作结果数据的对象初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using an object that contains the data from the data operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据操作已完成且未发生错误时，会使用此构造函数。This constructor is used when the data operation has finished without an error. `result`参数包含一个对象，表示数据操作的结果。The `result` parameter contains an object that represents the result of the data operation. 属性自动设置为`null`。The property is automatically set to `null`.

summary.span: 获取在数据操作过程中引发的异常。

span.span: Gets the exception that was thrown during the data operation.

value.span: 如果出现错误，则为表示异常的 对象；否则为 。

span.span: An object that represents the exception, if an error occurred; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在操作期间引发异常，则该异常存储在属性。If an exception is raised during the data operation, the exception is stored in the property. 可以创建事件处理程序， ， ， ，并事件和异常，如果有，检索通过属性。You can create event handlers for the , , , , and events and retrieve the exception, if any, through the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的事件处理程序事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 事件处理程序中，如果属性是`null`，此对象中检索 ID 的产品属性。In the event handler, if the property is `null`, the product ID is retrieved from the object in the property. 产品 ID 是主键的表和数据库，因此，完成插入操作之前不知道值设置。The product ID is a primary key for the table and is set by the database, so the value is not known until the insert operation has finished. 如果记录异常消息属性不等于`null`。The exception message is logged if the property is not equal to `null`. 属性设置为`true`。The property is then set to `true`. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示异常是否已得到处理而不该再次引发。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the exception was handled and that it should not be thrown again.

value.span: 如果异常已得到处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the exception was handled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以创建事件处理程序， ， ， ，和事件来检查这些操作期间发生的任何异常。You can create event handlers for the , , , , and events to examine any exceptions that occurred during those operations. 如果处理异常，并且不希望它再次引发设置属性设置为`true`。If you handle the exception and do not want it to be thrown again, set the property to `true`. 如果未设置属性设置为`true`，异常将传播到调用堆栈中的下一个事件处理程序。If you do not set the property to `true`, the exception will be propagated to the next event handler in the call stack. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的事件处理程序事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 事件处理程序中，如果属性是`null`，此对象中检索 ID 的产品属性。In the event handler, if the property is `null`, the product ID is retrieved from the object in the property. 产品 ID 是主键的表和数据库设置，因此，完成插入操作之前，不知道值。The product ID is a primary key for the table and is set by the database, therefore the value is not known until the insert operation has finished. 如果记录异常消息属性不等于`null`。The exception message is logged if the property is not equal to `null`. 属性设置为`true`。The property is then set to `true`. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取表示数据操作结果的对象。

span.span: Gets the object that represents the result of a data operation.

value.span: 包含数据操作结果数据的对象。

span.span: An object that contains the data from the data operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用属性可以检查值返回数据操作。You use the property to examine values returned from a data operation. 您可以从数据操作检索输出参数或修改从查询返回的值。You can retrieve output parameters from a data operation or modify the values returned from a query. 中存储的数据属性依赖于已执行的数据操作的类型。The data stored in the property depends on the type of data operation that has been performed. 删除数据，当属性包含的对象中指定的类型属性，从数据源已删除的原始值。When you delete data, the property contains an object of the type specified in the property, with the original values that were deleted from the data source. 在插入或更新数据时属性包含的对象中指定的类型属性，保存到数据源的新值。When you insert or update data, the property contains an object of the type specified in the property, with the new values that were saved to the data source. 当您选择的数据，属性包含查询的结果。When you select data, the property contains the results of the query. 如果选择的查询涉及对数据进行分组或选择从中指定的类型的属性子集属性，属性包含动态创建类型的对象。If the select query involves grouping the data or selecting a subset of properties from the type specified in the property, the property contains an object of a dynamically created type. 否则为属性包含的对象中指定的类型属性。Otherwise, the property contains an object of the type specified in the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的事件处理程序事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 事件处理程序中，如果属性是`null`，此对象中检索 ID 的产品属性。In the event handler, if the property is `null`, the product ID is retrieved from the object in the property. 产品 ID 是主键的表和数据库设置，因此，完成插入操作之前，不知道值。The product ID is a primary key for the table and is set by the database, therefore the value is not known until the insert operation has finished. 如果记录异常消息属性不等于`null`。The exception message is logged if the property is not equal to `null`. 属性设置为`true`。The property is then set to `true`. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TotalRowCount As Integer
public: property int TotalRowCount { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取数据检索操作过程中在某个数据集中检索的总行数。

span.span: Gets the total number of rows in a data set from a data-retrieval operation.

value.span: 数据检索操作过程中在某个数据集中检索的总行数；如果 对象是在数据修改操作过程中创建的，则为 -1；如果通过将 设置为 并将 设置为 启用了自定义分页，则为 -1。

span.span: The total number of rows in a data set from the data retrieval operation; -1 if the object was created during a data modification operation; -1 if you enabled customized paging by setting to and by setting to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用属性数据检索操作过程中数据集获取的记录数。You use the property to get the number of records in the data set during a data retrieval operation. 通常情况下，您检索此属性时要显示的数据页并且想要显示的记录总数。Typically, you retrieve this property when you are displaying pages of data and want to show the total number of records. 换数据时中的值属性可能会不同于实际的查询返回的行数。When data is being paged, the value in the property might be different from the actual number of rows that are returned by the query. 这是因为查询将返回只数据的页所需的行数。This is because the query returns only the number of rows that are needed for that page of data. 属性包含查询中的记录数，仅当访问中的事件处理程序时事件。The property contains the number of records from a query only when it is accessed in an event handler for the event. 当从事件处理程序访问的属性， ， ，或事件，属性包含-1。When the property is accessed from an event handler for the , , , or event, the property contains -1. 值属性依赖于的属性控件，然后在`AllowPaging`数据绑定控件的属性。The value of the property depends on the property of the control, and on the `AllowPaging` property of the data-bound control. 下表总结了的可能值属性。The following table summarizes the possible values for the property. |LinqDataSource 控件 AutoPage 属性AutoPage Property of LinqDataSource control|AllowPaging 数据绑定控件属性AllowPaging Property of data-bound control|TotalRowCount 属性TotalRowCount property|结果Outcome| |-------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------|----------------------------|-------------| |`true`|`true`|查询的记录数。Number of records for a query.|自动分页数据。Data is automatically paged.| |`false`|`false`|查询的记录数。Number of records for a query.|不分页数据。Data is not paged.| |`true`|`false`|-1-1|不分页数据。Data is not paged.| |`false`|`true`|分配给的值中的事件处理程序属性事件。The value that you assigned to the property in the event handler for the event.|指定自定义分页时根据的值，分页数据。Data is paged according to the values that you specified when you customized paging.| ## Examples 下面的示例演示与网页控件，控件，和一个控件。The following example shows a Web page with a control, a control, and a control. 控件定义的事件处理程序事件。The control defines an event handler for the event. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs.TotalRowCount#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs.TotalRowCount/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs.TotalRowCount#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs.TotalRowCount/vb/Default.aspx#1)] 下面的示例显示了事件处理程序的代码事件。The following example shows the code for the event handler for the event. 值属性分配给控件。The value of the property is assigned to the control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs.TotalRowCount#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs.TotalRowCount/cs/Default.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs.TotalRowCount#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs.TotalRowCount/vb/Default.aspx.vb#2)]
